name: Ben's House
description:
Ben's House:
Ben Has Kidnapped You From Your Home And Tries To Kill You In Ben's House, But Why You Will Found Out In-Game.
This Is A Stealth Horror Game Where You Need To Solve Puzzles And Escape With An Amazing Story Line And Many Cutscenes. The Game Will Be Updated And It Will Be More Content In The Future.
Can You Escape From Ben Or Is It To Late?
Contols:
Move The Player With W,A,S,D, Interact With "E", Run With Shift, Crouch With "CTRL" And Jump With Space.

Please Let Me Know If You Discover Any Bugs So I Can Fix Them :)

Please Join Our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/JEfj3FCthJ
My Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@Mr.BossGuy
